1391.name: OA 60-68B
1391.Applications:
Chromium free hardfacing wire for extreme abrasion. 
Single layer on mild steel reaches a hardnerss > 60HRc.
1391.Suitable_For: Cr-free Hardfacing alloy against extreme abrasion like agricultural equipment, sand, snow scratchers, stone cutting tools and mining equipment, Highway construction equipment and conveyor chains, mixing paddles, cement pumps components, etc. 2 layer hardness : 61-68HRc.
